languages.text: "Разве это не то, что обещают все ереси? Давайте отвергнем наш путь, исказим учение и двинемся к будущему, которое вроде бы будет лучше, но на деле принесет только опасности и скорбь?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
languages.original_text: "Разве это не то, что обещают все ереси? Давайте отвергнем наш путь, исказим учение и двинемся к будущему, которое вроде бы будет лучше, но на деле принесет только опасности и скорбь?"

traits.locale_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"
"Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

languages.text: 「それは異端者がよくする約束ではなく？‘我々の道は断念し、ドクトリンを歪曲し、そしてより良き未来だと見せかけて実際は我々には危険と苦悩しかない方向へ行きましょう’と？」
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: 「それは異端者がよくする約束ではなく？‘我々の道は断念し、ドクトリンを歪曲し、そしてより良き未来だと見せかけて実際は我々には危険と苦悩しかない方向へ行きましょう’と？」

languages.text: “所有异端邪说不都是这么承诺的吗？让你们放弃当下的道路，歪曲正确的教义，朝着看似更加美好的未来前进，但道路尽头却只有危险与绝望。难道不是这样吗？”
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: “所有异端邪说不都是这么承诺的吗？让你们放弃当下的道路，歪曲正确的教义，朝着看似更加美好的未来前进，但道路尽头却只有危险与绝望。难道不是这样吗？”

languages.text: "Ist das nicht das Versprechen jeder Ketzerei? 'Wir verlassen unseren Pfad, verändern unsere Doktrin und brechen auf in eine vermeintlich bessere Zukunft, die uns aber letztlich nur Gefahr und Kummer bringt'?"
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist das nicht das Versprechen jeder Ketzerei? 'Wir verlassen unseren Pfad, verändern unsere Doktrin und brechen auf in eine vermeintlich bessere Zukunft, die uns aber letztlich nur Gefahr und Kummer bringt'?"

languages.text: « N'est-ce pas la promesse de toutes les hérésies ? Renoncer à notre voie, dénaturer notre doctrine et foncer tête baissée vers ce qui ressemble à un avenir meilleur, mais qui ne nous réserve en réalité que danger et malheur ? »
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: « N'est-ce pas la promesse de toutes les hérésies ? Renoncer à notre voie, dénaturer notre doctrine et foncer tête baissée vers ce qui ressemble à un avenir meilleur, mais qui ne nous réserve en réalité que danger et malheur ? »

languages.text: «¿No es eso lo que prometen todas las herejías? "Renunciemos al camino de la rectitud, distorsionemos nuestra doctrina y avancemos hacia lo que parece un futuro mejor, pero en realidad solo nos depara peligro y dolor"?».
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No es eso lo que prometen todas las herejías? "Renunciemos al camino de la rectitud, distorsionemos nuestra doctrina y avancemos hacia lo que parece un futuro mejor, pero en realidad solo nos depara peligro y dolor"?».

languages.text: "Bu kâfirlik anlamına gelmiyor mu? 'Yolumuzdan feragat edelim, doktrinimizden sapalım ve daha iyiymiş gibi görünen ancak bizim için yalnızca tehlikeler ve keder vadeden bir geleceğe doğru yol alalım.'?"
languages.original_text: "Is that not the promise of every heresy? 'Let's renounce our path, distort our doctrine, and head out toward what looks like a better future but actually only has danger and grief in store for us'?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kâfirlik anlamına gelmiyor mu? 'Yolumuzdan feragat edelim, doktrinimizden sapalım ve daha iyiymiş gibi görünen ancak bizim için yalnızca tehlikeler ve keder vadeden bir geleceğe doğru yol alalım.'?"
